title: Icecream flavour (Test poll)
desc: What flavour should we buy for tonight's party? (You and four simulated voters)

options.name: Vanilla
options.desc: This will get universal approval if you rate it at more than zero or if you abstain

options.name: Chocolate
options.desc: This will get 80% approval if you rate it at 21 or higher

options.name: Strawberry
options.desc: This is the favourite of two simulated voters

options.name: Lemon
options.desc: This is the favourite of one simulated voter

options.name: Mango
